column5: There may be hope YET !!!  Check it out :  http://www.sooeveningnews.com/article/20141101/News/141109914/?Start=2
That's awesome..... 8 atlantic fry....  In Lake O?????   Not lol....  Burt
Took the only 8 and put them in a jar....
8.... That number sounds eerily familiar with the returns the Credit gets.
Noble effort but after this many years a failed experiment lets find a better use for those funds

Honestly I thought most of the fish in the St. Marys were of natural regeneration so finding a few fry is not any great news.   Even  considering Lake Ontario there is a big difference between finding a few  fry and finding enough to produce a self sustainable  population.
Atlantic run in the soo was fantastic this year. Keep it up Roger and the lssu team! Lake O program.......no comment lol  TDunn
